pullrequest.title: Add gravity, magnetic field API's to World class

content.raw:
I've only added new API's to `World` in this pull request. I am planning to deprecate `PhysicsEngine::GetGravity` and `PhysicsEngine::MagneticField` in favor of the `World::` API's, but I'm saving that for a later pull request, but it's not too small (a0178f3).

So for new API's I thought we didn't have to touch Migration.md, just for deprecations and removals?
content.html:
I've only added new API's to World in this pull request. I am planning to deprecate PhysicsEngine::GetGravity and PhysicsEngine::MagneticField in favor of the World:: API's, but I'm saving that for a later pull request, but it's not too small (a0178f3).

So for new API's I thought we didn't have to touch Migration.md, just for deprecations and removals?
